Articles.Content:
I've been working on a medium scale Eve mission recently. The focus of this mission will be to explore a near sea level region of Eve and name a lot of islands.

I have made four videos so far:

  1. Designing the ascent vehicle
  2. Launching a relay network
  3. Launching a scout plane to search for a good launch site
  4. Designing aircraft to explore Eve with

Here is the playlist:

Enjoy!
